comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: "Saint Margaret's Church is the parish church of Lowestoft in the English county of Suffolk. It is dedicated to St Margaret of Antioch[1] and is notable for its large illuminated blue spire which can be seen across the town. The church is located on a hilltop on the north-western edge of the town centre and was used as a navigation landmark.[2]" en.wikipedia.org/wiki/St._Margaret's_Church,_Lowestoft The church's history from its own site: www.stmargaretslowestoft.co.uk/st-margarets-church/church...
